Detailed Description

A widget to edit a path. This widget have button attached to open a dialog.

This class is an association of a Directory Line editor and a button. The button call the changePath slot from the DirectoryEdit class.

bool DirectoryEditWidget::isDirectory (  )  const

This property holds whether the input is a directory or a file.

Return true if the widget is used to edit directory, or false if the widget is used to edit file.
